item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 2:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Harris pitches for centre in first big TV interview as candidate
2. Zelenskyy faces backlash over Russia’s breach of eastern defences
3. Economist Eugene Fama: ‘Efficient markets is a hypothesis. It’s not reality’
4. Zelenskyy sacks air force chief after top pilot killed in F-16 crash
5. Italy weighs sharp tourist tax rise in furore over impact of visitors
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 2:35 AM UTC
